revised_title: Observations of Subterranean Fire in a Coal-Mine Near Newcastle
tldr: The author, D. Lucas Hodgson, shares his observations of a subterranean fire in a coal-mine near Newcastle. He discusses the properties of the fire, the surrounding environment, and the minerals found in the area. Hodgson also experiments with the minerals and shares his findings, including the possibility of coal producing a volatile salt through the action of fire.
